def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_line = is_line([x,y,z], ctx)
        check_xyz_large = all([is_large(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y,z]])
        check_b_darker_ac = is_darker(y, x, ctx) and is_darker(y, z, ctx)
        check_b_middle = y == get_middle([x,y,z], ctx)
        if (
            check_xyz_line
            and check_xyz_large
            and check_b_darker_ac
            and check_b_middle
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z])
    return results
state = turn(state)

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_medium = all([is_medium_size(dot, ctx) for dot in [x,y]])
        check_xy_close = get_distance(x, y, ctx) < 0.1
        check_x_left_y = is_left(x, y, ctx)
        if (
            check_xy_medium
            and check_xy_close
            and check_x_left_y
        ):
            results.append([x,y])
    return results
state = turn(state)
